## Anchor.href property

The URL the hyperlink references. See [&lt;a&gt; element](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
href: string;
```

## Remarks

HTML Attribute: href
